g.text: Send Proposed Award Notification Letter with Exhibit A of Grant Agreement(Contact Info, Project Budget, Project Description, Performance Standards)(COTRAMS)
Break eligible applications into pools by type of project (replacement vehicle, expansion vehicle, capital construction)
Send proposed Award list for each program to DTR Director
Review and consult CASTA if needed
If in an MPO, work with MPO to TIP project
File accepted Award letter with confirmation
Issue public notification of Awards (website, email)
Review agency profile for Civil Rights and equity considerations
Review and score applications according to NOFA criteria
Notify CRBRC, Accounting, and DTR Grants Unit
Submit list of ranked projects to DTR Programming
